Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CliUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CliUtils
  • public class CliUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utils available to the CLI user interface to update the internal model representation and visualize the game.

        static int handleChooseBetweenMoveAndBuild()
        Handles the choice between moving and building, that can happen with specific powers.
        Returns:
        1 if the input chooses to build, 0 if he chooses to move.

                                                         int idPlayer)
        Gets the workers' positions for a specific player.
        Parameters:
        workersMask - the representation of the workers' positions as a matrix storing the ids.

        Returns:

        Finds a specific action in the list of possible ones, based only on the coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the action.
        y - the y coordinate of the action.
        actions - the list of possible actions.
        Returns:

      • getActionNumber

        static int getActionNumber​(int x,
                           int y,
                           java.util.List<Action> possibleActions,
                           java.lang.String workerId)
        Finds a specific action in the list of possible ones, based only on the coordinates and the worker's id.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the action.
        y - the y coordinate of the action.
        possibleActions - the list of possible actions.
        workerId - the worker's id.
        Returns:
        the index of the requested action in the list.

      • getActionNumber

        static int getActionNumber​(int x,
                           int y,
                           java.util.List<Action> possibleActions,
                           java.lang.String workerId,
                           int level)
        Finds a specific action in the list of possible ones, based only on the coordinates, the worker's id and the building level.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the action.
        y - the y coordinate of the action.
        possibleActions - the list of possible actions.
        workerId - the worker's id.
        level - the building level.
        Returns:
        the index of the requested action in the list.

                                      java.lang.String message,
                                      int startX,
                                      int startY)
        Handles a WASD selection on the game board, with an header message.
        Parameters:
        model - the model instance.
        message - the header message to display above the board.
        startX - the starting horizontal index.
        startY - the starting vertical index.
        Returns:
        the selected space.
